entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Three Hills
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
